subject: Control box sparking when coonected
description_text:
Hi,

Having a little issue with the haptic control box, it sparks when I try to
connect the power source. Also losing power connection when in use as the
connector is very loose {male to female) and disconnects.

Great when working but right now too dangerous to use {sparking)

Any chance of a replacement unit?

The pedals are awesome !!! Love then...

Ashley


*Order #SSN3111*
